tool_description: Optimizes traffic signal timing plans for intersections based on traffic flow patterns to minimize delays and improve network throughput.

intersection_ids.description: List of intersection identifiers to optimize

traffic_flows.description: Traffic flow data for each intersection approach

cycle_length_range.description: Min and max cycle lengths in seconds [min, max]

coordination_required.description: Whether intersections should be coordinated for progression

error_messages: Invalid intersection data: intersection_ids cannot be empty and must contain valid identifiers
Invalid traffic flows: traffic_flows array cannot be empty and must contain positive numeric values
Unsupported optimization objective: Use one of [minimize_delay, maximize_throughput, minimize_stops]
Invalid cycle length range: Must be array of two integers with min < max, both between 30-300 seconds
Data mismatch: Number of traffic flow values must match intersection approaches
usage: Provide intersection_ids and traffic_flows data, optionally specify optimization_objective and timing constraints. Returns optimized signal timing plans.

optimized_timings.description: Optimized signal timing values in seconds for each intersection phase

cycle_lengths.description: Optimized cycle lengths for each intersection

delay_reduction.description: Estimated delay reduction percentage from optimization

coordination_offsets.description: Coordination offsets between intersections if coordination_required is true
